content.question: Directions: Listen to the selection, then select from among the answer choices the reply that would most probably be made to the remark or question.

choices.label: Qui, elle s’est cassé la jambe.
Oui, elle dit qu’il n'y avait plus de pain.
Oui, elle l'a rencontrée aux sports d’hiver.
Oui, elle a eu un pneu crevé.

content.answer: Oui, elle a eu un pneu crevé.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
